mapper.update:
update output_list
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cp_id = #{cpId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
link_id = #{linkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
access_num = #{accessNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderstring_type = #{orderstringType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stream_no = #{streamNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
correlator = #{correlator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where output_list_id = #{outputListId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update output_list set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cp_id = #{cpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, link_id = #{linkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_num = #{accessNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderstring_type = #{orderstringType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stream_no = #{streamNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, correlator = #{correlator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where output_list_id = #{outputListId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from output_list where cp_id = #{cpid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND order_time BETWEEN #{start_time,jdbcType=DATE}and #{end_time,jdbcType=DATE} ORDER BY order_time
